Body:
"""Run through various options and make sure nothing is broken"""
nparr = get_test_array(is_xda=False)
xda = get_test_array(is_xda=True)
for arr in [nparr, xda]:
    ecco.plot_tiles(arr, **vdict)
    plt.close()
pytest.mark.parametrize('vdict', [{}, {'cmap': 'plasma'}, {'layout':
    'latlon', 'rotate_to_latlon': False}, {'layout': 'latlon',
    'rotate_to_latlon': False, 'Arctic_cap_tile_location': 5}, {'layout':
    'latlon', 'rotate_to_latlon': False, 'Arctic_cap_tile_location': 7}, {
    'layout': 'latlon', 'rotate_to_latlon': False,
    'Arctic_cap_tile_location': 10}, {'show_colorbar': True}, {
    'show_colorbar': True, 'show_cbar_label': True, 'cbar_label':
    'something good'}, {'show_tile_labels': False}, {'fig_size': 20}, {
    'less_output': False}])
